name: Eidolons Between Realms
description:
Our team's submission for the Bullet Hell Jam 2022

Fly your way through bullets and fantastic creatures to a realm where your brother and you could live together!

Team
  • Design, Programming, Art: Yann Dupont & Emma Neiss (Old Dry Witch Games)
  • SFX: Marius Roelly (Orkhyd)
Special thanks to our testers 💖
  • Louis Hasenfratz
  • Nathan Mercier
  • Théo Blanc
  • Justin "Mamène" Pabot
External assets
  • Menu music: Forest Music by Sirental
  • Level & credits music: Battle music 1 (Free Fantasy RPG Music Pack) by JP Soundworks (https://www.youtube.com/c/JPSoundworks/)
  • Boss 1 music: Bumblebee loop by jobromedia. Music promoted by https://www.melodyflix.com
  • Boss 2 music: Battle music 2 (Free Fantasy RPG Music Pack) by JP Soundworks
  • Final boss music: Northern Mountains by Mattias Westlund. Music promoted by https://www.melodyflix.com
  • Input Prompts: Input Prompts Pixel 16× by Kenney
  • Laser sound: Edited from beam5 by ejfortin
